<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> that represents everything that will be needed to construct a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> that represents everything that will be needed to construct a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a>.

These nodes are created during the instruction selection proper phase.

Note that the only supported way to set the <code>memoperands</code> is by calling the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a66ebc3ec1c8816b16a5f239a8631c780">SelectionDAG::setNodeMemRefs</a></code> function as the memory management happens inside the DAG rather than in the node.

Definition at line 3060 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
